page.title: Welcome to the Programming Survey
page.content:
We're excited to learn more about your programming journey and experience. This survey will help us understand the diverse backgrounds and skills within our community.
## What to Expect
This survey consists of several sections covering: - Programming language preferences - Framework experience - Professional background - Project highlights
Your responses will help us better understand the development community and improve our services.
Click 'Next' to begin the survey.

page.title: Programming Languages
page.content:
## Programming Language Preferences
Let's start by learning about your preferred programming language.
> Your choice helps us understand which languages are most popular among developers.
### Why This Matters
Understanding programming language preferences helps us: - Identify industry trends - Plan future content and resources - Support the most relevant technologies - Build better developer tools

question.text: What is your favorite programming language?

page.title: Framework Experience
page.content:
## Web Development Experience
Let's explore your experience with web development frameworks and tools.
### Why Framework Choice Matters
Your framework preferences help us understand: - Current industry trends - Developer workflow preferences - Technology adoption patterns - Common development stacks
> Understanding framework usage patterns helps us provide better resources and support for the community.
### Experience Level
We also want to know about your years of experience to better understand: - Career progression - Technology adoption cycles - Skill development patterns - Industry maturity

question.text: Which web frameworks have you used? (Select all that apply)
How many years of programming experience do you have?

page.title: Professional Background
page.content:
## Your Professional Journey
Tell us about your current role and experience.
### Why We Ask
Your job title helps us understand: - The diversity of roles in tech - Career progression patterns - Industry composition - Skills distribution
This information helps us tailor content and resources to different professional needs.

question.text: What is your current job title?

page.title: Project Experience
page.content:
## Project Showcase
In this final section, we'd like to learn about your most significant programming achievement.
Please include: - Technical challenges faced - Solutions implemented - Technologies used - Lessons learned
